description: A bongo cat that sits in your bar and slaps when you type.

settings.rave-mode-desc: Change colors to the beat when music is playing
settings.tappy-mode-desc: Make the cat tap along to the beat when music is playing
settings.mpris-filter-desc: Only react to audio when a non-blacklisted media player is playing (uses Noctalia Shell audio blacklist)
settings.in-input-group: User is in the input group
settings.not-in-input-group: User is not in the input group
settings.cava-not-installed: cava is not installed (rave mode won't work)

toast.auto-detect-failed-desc: Could not detect keyboard devices. Please configure manually in settings.
